ygData.subject: RE: Bristlebane
ygData.msgSnippet: The gnomes of Ak Anon worship Bristlebane in the Abbey of Deep Musing. Kitasi ... From: Bosmun [mailto:bosmun@usa.net] Sent: Friday, July 23, 1999 1:14 PM To:
ygData.messageBody:
The gnomes of Ak'Anon worship Bristlebane in the Abbey of Deep Musing.

Kitasi

-----Original Message-----
From: Bosmun [mailto:bosmun@...]
Sent: Friday, July 23, 1999 1:14 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] Bristlebane


From: "Bosmun" <bosmun@...>

Hi all. My bard is a follower of Bristlebane, and I've been hoping
to find
a temple or shrine to him, so that I can make a journey there in game
sometime, but I'm at a loss. Does anyone know if there are any temples or
shrines to Bristlebane? I fear it may be in one of the evil cities, that I
haven't visited yet.



Bien -- Karana
